snippet: The choreographer Jonah Bokaer let down his guard when he performed alongside his Tunisian-born father, Tsvi, at Gould Hall.
abstract: Gia Kourlas reviews premiere of dance piece The Ulysses Syndrome, choreographed and performed by Jonah Bokaer and featuring his father Tsvi, at French Institute Alliance Francaise as part of its World Nomads festival.
lead_paragraph: The choreographer Jonah Bokaer let down his guard when he performed alongside his Tunisian-born father, Tsvi, at Gould Hall.

headline.seo: Jonah Bokaer and His Father, Tsvi, Dance at Gould Hall
headline.main: Exploring His Tunisian Roots, With His Father by His Side
headline.print_headline: Exploring His Tunisian Roots, With His Father by His Side

keywords.value: Gould, Florence, Hall (French Institute Alliance Francaise)
